statement: Searches of the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration (SAMHSA) announcements and the Arkansas DHS SABG program pages for FY‑2026 found no compliance determinations or enforcement actions.  The available information focuses on grant program requirements and state prevention initiatives.
statutory_basis:
The Arkansas DHS SABG program page and related information discuss prevention requirements and funding but do not
contain any compliance determinations or enforcement actions【694662080385875†L862-L870】.
